Description:
783m2 BLOCK HOUSE PLUS BUNGALOW
(218010) 4 Bedrooms in the main home with floating timber floors and quality carpets, bay window to the lounge, top of the range Belling 5 burner 2 oven cooker and dishwasher to the kitchen, air conditioner and ducted heating, immaculate throughout.
Outdoors we have a fantastic enclosed entertaining area great for entertaining in, we also have a self-contained bungalow perfect for dependent relatives, interstate visitors or whatever.
A powered workshop, 2 car carport and another double high clearance carport suitable for caravan, boat or horse float. Quiet court location, walking distance to train station, schools and shops.
Call Frank Barrett for all enquiries WE ARE OPEN SUNDAYS

Description:
Townhouse with 4 car garage
Always working from home and need a separate working space? this is perfect for all home businesses, featuring a full apartment upstairs with main bedroom that has a walk through robe that leads to a large ensuite with spacious shower and bath as well as parkland views, 2 other bedrooms with built in robes, main bathroom with shower and toilet, spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, dishwasher and plenty of cupboard space as well as access to the balcony also looking over parklands, down stairs has an extra large home office area and toilet with private access to the house and also separate front door entrances so your clients cannot access your house, this home also features a 4 car lock up garage and ducted heating, ceiling fans and split systems in home and in office area, located close to schools and a short drive to Cranbourne Central, this one of a kind home that has never been seen before in Cranbourne will not last long. Residential
Component is currently leased @ $370 per week.

Cranbourne's best buy!
CRANBOURNE | Positioned within a sought after area and close to schools, shops and public transport is this 3 bedroom family home. Outside offers a rear courtyard and a single lockup remote garage. With new carpet and flooring throughout, if you are looking for an investment property or you are a first home buyer on a budget, this is the one you've been looking for.

Description:
"One That Has It All"
It’s refreshing to offer a property that has something for everyone.
Perfectly positioned on a large 697 SQM allotment that is within minutes of schools, shopping centres, public transport and sporting facilities is this well cared for and beautifully presented family home. Boasting 4 bedrooms the master with ensuite and parents retreat, spacious lounge dining, fully functional kitchen with an abundance of storage/cupboard space, tiled bathroom and fitted laundry. Externally the property features an oversized carport ideal for housing 4 wheel drives, caravans and horse floats as well providing access to the extensively concreted parking area and the huge lock up garage. The covered outdoor entertaining area which incorporates a built in children’s cubby house/play zone overlooks the lovely landscaped gardens.
Further inclusions of note: polished timber floors, solar power, air conditioning, ducted heating and wood heater.
Possible Development Site Subject to Council Approval
Just stop looking and inspect this property now.
Photo Id Require

Description:
Everything at Your Fingertips
Whether you are looking for an ideal location to reside or the perfect investment, this property should be on top of your inspection list.
Featuring:
- Large living spaces
-.Featuring spacious master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, huge second
bedroom with BIR's
- Kitchen with stainless steel appliances and loads of cupboard space.
- Gas ducted heating.
- Split system cooling.
- Floating floors.
- Decked outdoor entertaining area.
-.Single garage with internal access.
- Great private pergola/patio area.
The location is second to none within walking distance to Cranbourne train station 1.2 Km's, parklands, Cranbourne CBD only a 5 minute drive, shopping facilities and medical facilities.
Cranbourne is a fast developing and family friendly area. Offering a great combination of schools including Cranbourne Primary, and St Peter's College, public schools, 13 Km's to Monash University Berwick
The area provides easy access to South Gippland Highway, including 12 Km's to the Monash Freeway and East Link . Cranbourne Park Shopping centre only 2.9 Km's away. (Google maps)
Call SP Shagi 0413076585 for all enquiries or to inspect as this won't last!

Description:
BACK ON THE MARKET
If location and a bigger block are of importance to you, then look no further than 6 Jillian Street, Cranbourne. Situated on a generous 690sqm block and located right near the heart of Cranbourne's town centre, this fantastic 3 bedroom home would be the perfect opportunity for the first home buyer, renovator, builder or developer.
Proudly boasting:
- 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home in original condition
- Lounge plus dining area
- 1.5 car garage and plenty of parking space
- 10x solar panels
- Shedding
- Potential subdivision STCA on 690sqm block
Further comforts of this home include:
- Gas wall heating, evaporative cooling and split system A/C
Located just a short walk from Cranbourne Park shopping centre, day care centres and within minutes of medical centres, vets, schools, Cranbourne train station, bus stops, direct access to the South Gippsland Highway and all other amenities Central Cranbourne has to offer. With the added bonus of a potential subdivision STCA this very well could be the perfect investment you have been looking for, make sure to inspect this outstanding property before it's too late.
Contact Luke Woodham on 0408 596 906 to arrange an inspection now.

Description:
Room for everybody
When there are new additions to the family. When your children grow into teenagers. When your in-laws decide to move in OR you just need your own space. This home has loads of space for all the family and more inside and out with an 804 sqm block of land.
Comprising:
- Five bedrooms including a large master bedroom, ensuite with twin vanities and walk-in robe, three of the bedrooms are king size with built-in robes
- Formal lounge at the front of the home
- Hostess kitchen with beautiful timber cabinetry and granite benchtops, Smeg 900mm oven, Fisher and Paykel dishwasher and ample cupboards
- Adjoining meals and family area
- Large laundry with lots of storage
- Huge home theatre room with large screen and speakers
- Extra large double garage with rear access
- Undercover outdoor entertaining area
- Extra features include gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, alarm system and solar HWS
Brookland Greens Estate is a highly desirable location south west of Cranbourne. With a plethora of parks with exercise and play equipment, walking and cycling tracks, parklands with exercise and play equipment, and walking distance to St Peter's College and only minutes to the heart of Cranbourne and major arterial roads for a city or peninsula commute, you cannot possibly miss this opportunity to live the good life!

Description:
4 Bedrooms! 4 Bathrooms! 3 Living Areas, Plus a Triple Car Garage! WOW I want this one Honey!
## Brookland Greens Estate ##
Modern, stylish & immaculately presented offering a functional free flowing floor plan, this beautiful home offers over 770 square metres of luxury living space situated in the stunning Brookland Green Estate. Struggling to fit all three generations under one roof? Struggle no more as this unique home accommodates to all.
When you step through the breathtaking double front door, be greeted with a spacious hallway with grey wash tiles flowing through the house, a front lounge room with a neutral colour tone throughout and a large versatile study or bedroom. The magnificent open plan kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances with an oversized bench top, abundance of cupboard space with a large pantry. The beautiful modern kitchen overlooks the living room and the light-filled meal area which offers sliding doors to your very own undercover alfresco area that presents the perfect place for relaxation as well as family interaction. The ground floor offers a powder room for all your guests and a large laundry with external access.
Those who demand the very best in life will not be disappointed with this home as you will have the option to be situated upstairs or downstairs as there are two stylish master bedrooms on each level. Both master bedrooms are very generous in space with equally impressive walk-in robs and beautiful oversized ensuite with an abundance of natural light. Not to mention the downstairs master bedroom leads to an outdoor area, and the upstairs master bedroom has an immaculate external balcony with a lovely view. In addition, you will find 2 well-sized bedrooms with built in robes and the upper level comprises an additional spacious rumpus area which is great for the kids.
With its impressive fully landscaped block and modern touch, this home offers immediate street appeal, not to mention the 3 car garage and large driveway.
The beautiful Brookland Green Estate is a quiet area located near Cranbourne swimming pools and just a short drive to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre as well as handy access to the major arterials makes this a perfect property for all buyers.

Description:
AN UPDATED 2 BEDROOM STREET FRONT UNIT IN CENTRAL CRANBOURNE
For a first home buyer looking to break into the market or an investor looking for areas on the rise, this vastly improved street front unit offers so much. In central position opposite Cranbourne Park Primary School and within minutes of Cranbourne train station, a great location is only the beginning. With a larger block than many units, it offers a low maintenance nature and has been significantly updated in the last year meaning its new owner can simply move and enjoy or rent it out with ease. Behind its classic brick façade you find a light filled home with tiles enhancing the lounge room with gas heater and split system air conditioner as well as a meals area adjoining the renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. There are 2 bedrooms with built in wardrobes as well as a family bathroom that has been updated along with the separate toilet and laundry. Outside, the north facing courtyard is both large and easy to care for while car accommodation is great too with single garage and room to park an extra car or 2 in the driveway.
To view this Statement of Information and Property Information Sheet go to the following link:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1u4C6u_r4ywaD3Tild5XIGsPg8HZqrPxr?usp=sharing

Description:
Family home with bells and whistles
Presenting a spacious 4 bedroom + study/5th bedroom, family friendly home for one lucky buyer. Master includes WIR + en-suite and the remaining all with BIR's. A separate front lounge adjacent to the study is perfect for the high school student looking for a flowing study space. Young children looking for an area to spread out and play as well as the adults looking for a bit of rest and relaxation. Open plan kitchen flowing out to meals and family lounge and then again extending to the outdoor alfresco, is perfect for the family that like to entertain and spend quality time together.
Additional features include:
- Side access
- Solar Power (9x1.2kw).
- 2100L Water Tank (garden use).
- 6x4.5m Shed with power + car access.
- Close by to parks, transport schools and shops
A convenient location, a spacious home and available for sale, there is only one thing left to do… Come and check out 6 Dunferline Cres while you still can.

Description:
2 houses for the price of 1
Perfect for those wanting space and opportunity. A unique prime piece of real estate located in a sough after location within the Rangebank Estate. Currently offering 2 homes on one large block of approx. 966sqm, with plans and permits soon to be approved (advertisement stage) for the block to become 2 separate titles and the prospect if you wish to knock down the rear home and erect a brand new 2 storey home on the rear block.
- Possibility for in-law, grandparent or sibling accommodation with unit at rear
- Walking distance to schooling, shops, public transport including train station
- Large renovated front home is ideal for large families offering 6 bedrooms
They say land is king when is comes to real estate so this property is sure to tick the boxes for a range of buyers. Be sure to inspect before it's too late or please do not hesitate to call for further information.

Description:
ALL THE BELLS AND WHISTLES
If you're looking for an exceptional family home with all the bells and whistles, then your search has well and truly come to an end.
16 The Belfry, Cranbourne generously ticks every box on your list with ease. Featuring a fantastic floorplan spanning over 31.9 squares, this home is sure to delight. As you step through the entrance, you are instantly impressed by the sheer size and it's easy to see why this is a 'forever home' for one lucky new owner. Greeted by an ample study area with internal access, the home flows onto the first of three separate living zones. The master suite located opposite is so inviting that you will be forgiven for enjoying a Sunday sleep in every weekend! All your needs are fastidiously met with more than enough room for a King Size Bed, incredibly spacious walk in robe, an ensuite that features a double shower, separate toilet, his and hers double vanity and an ample spa bath overlooking your manicured gardens, it's the perfect spot to enjoy some 'me time' and de-stress after a hard day's work.
Travel down the long hallway to your open plan kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, double sink and ample 5 burner gas oven, entertaining will be simply effortless. The heart of the home is further complimented by an ample meals/dining space that overlooks the covered outdoor entertaining area and perfectly manicured low maintenance gardens.
A further two large living zones flow on from the kitchen where family and guests are spoilt for choice. Create your own Theatre room for the children while the guests remain undisturbed in the third living area.
Sliding doors to the rear gardens ensure you can laze the day away in the sun on the ample decked area or relax and unwind in the fully fenced outdoor spa bath.
The remaining three oversized bedrooms which include BIR'S to all, can be found at the rear of the home. Serviced by a full family bathroom with separate toilet you can always ensure family harmony.
With the addition of Gas Ducted Heating, Evaporative Cooling and continuous instant hot water, your family can be guaranteed to enjoy true comfort, regardless of the season.
Other extra features include a DLUG with another single roller door at the rear which leads to extra parking accommodation for a third car, boat or caravan. A workshop is also included for extra outdoor storage and with 2 x 5,500 litre water tanks to service your established double vegetable patch and incredibly generous 800m2, you simply could not ask for more.
With the property sitting just minutes away from Barton Primary School, Cranbourne West Primary School, St Peters College, The Royal Botanic Gardens, Ranfurlie Golf Course and Cranbourne Shopping Centre, its time stop what you're doing and pick up the phone!
To inspect this property today, do not delay!
Call Fiona Hodgson on 0477157755 or Juanita Kouvelis on 0407 831 777 (Executive Assistant to Fiona Hodgson)
